channel.title: Looking for a hoster for Ouchscape Pk V 1.2
channel.description:
Hi, Im looking for a trustworthy player that could potentially host my server and become co-owner if i decide theyre doing a good job. If you want a look around the server then follow this link to the thread. If you'd like a quick play and stuff just pm me and no its not an un-fucking edited pimp/phonescape server...
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,61705.0.html
The hoster must know basic coding and have a router and know how to work and run a no-ip server. Im AM looking for 24/7 but around 12 hours a day would be fine. If 12 hours must be living around the Uk for timezones. Ill add this to favs and randomly post it up to get interest. I know it may take some time..
- R0FL
